thread.title: Parents Reveal Why Their Kids Think They’re Big Huge Jerks
thread.title_full: Parents Reveal Why Their Kids Think They’re Big Huge Jerks

author: Abby Heugel
title: Parents Reveal Why Their Kids Think They’re Big Huge Jerks
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 376 Shares 
Being a parent is the hardest job in the world. Between trying to keep your kids entertained and alive, you're faced with judgment — from your kids. 
They're too young to realize that (more than) half the things you don't let them do are simply for their own good, so instead they simply assume you're a horrible person. 
In case you want to feel better about yourself, these parents spilled the beans on why they're kids aren't exactly too thrilled. Big Hairy Deal
